name: Dominoes Challenge
description:
Connect the same numbered tiles.
Use up all the cards that you have then you will be the winner!
3 different game rules, offline mode, and multiplayer mode supported.

[Features]
- 1 to 4 people can enjoy the game at the same time.
- 3 unique modes supported. (Draw mode, Block mode, All Five mode)
- Useful Items that will save you from crisis
- Battle Mode: get more gold rewards from the mode.
- 16 languages supported.
- Achievement& Leaderboard supported.
- Tablet PC and smart pads supported.
